name: mainly
posTip: A word that describes or gives more information about a verb, adjective or other adverb.

trans_examp.trans_en: usually or to a large degree
trans_examp.trans_cn: 通常地；主要地；大部分地

example.eg: I mainly go to bed around midnight.
The group is made up of mainly young people.
example.egtrans: 该团体主要由年轻人组成。

example.eg: They argued that the tax will mainly benefit the rich.
example.egtrans: 他们争辩说这项税收将主要让富人受益。
